description.en: $LEMN is a token issued by Cryptolemon, an affiliate of Kyung Nam Pharm. CO., Ltd. and its consumers can readily get the token as a reward by purchasing the products according to its own NFT grade. $LEMN has an innovative and user-friendly distribution B2E (Buy to Earn) platform based on blockchain.
